short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplify homework management with intuitive task tracking and organization.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Meet the Mini Homework Planner, your go-to tool for effortless academic organization. Seamlessly add assignments, classes, and due dates, all conveniently sorted by classes and deadlines. Never miss a beat with a clear view of upcoming assignments and completed tasks. Customize the interface to match your style while staying focused on your academic success. Stay ahead and stay organized with the Mini Homework Planner.

Version 1.0.2 - Minor Patch
We updated dark mode to look more natural.

Version 1.0.1 - Minor Patch
We're excited to introduce a minor patch that includes the ability to add a class while in the assignment form.
